Topic.Title: AMZN doing the AAPL topping out dance

Message.Msg: It does sorta look like APPL did when it topped out, but there is a big difference. APPL is making about $40 a share, Amazon is making zero profit. APPL dropped about 30%, Amazon will probably drop about 80%. Unless of course Amazon has to declare bankruptcy in which case it will drop to zero.

Message.Title: Off to the races for AMZN tomorrow? With no bad news w/ Syria:::
Message.Msg: Will the debt ceiling become an issue this week? What about Obama care? Do we spend all week talking about the taper? It seems as if Syria is now 'off the table' and Europe and Asia are off to the races today while US markets are closed. It's likely to flutter lower at the end of the week but I won't be surprised to see a rising tide lift all boats tomorrow before fear/reality sink in and markets creep lower on the week... again. G/L trading but I expect it to pop on Tuesday with the markets.

4??????? Let me guess, they're all nanotechnology based and fit on a pencil eraser. Your corporate headquarters is your pencil holder on your desk. Just how many employees can you fit in that thing?????

Topic.Title: Off to the races for AMZN tomorrow? With no bad news w/ Syria:::

Message.Msg: STRONG rally on Monday and "no news" out pushes Asia up again (Tuesday); US futures looking for a big pop to start the week. Smells like a move back to 285 easily tomorrow... Pray for a slow open tomorrow and jumping on some AAPL and GOOG calls as they both are likely to crush it this week following recent pull backs and 'no news' getting in the way of the rally until possible employment report on Fri~ Bummer for the puts I currently have in AMZN, guaranteed to get destroyed at the open tomorrow, just wondering if the rally fizzles all week and we close lower.... what to do. Sell em' and go long Apple and Google?

Topic.Title: Curious, just what is Amazon's real PE?....and why...

Message.Msg: What a stupid, no position dirtyJew
A pencil holder is more than large enough to hold your brain mass... The future will be quite rough for you.
